recipe.title: Mango and Mint Salsa
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon finely minced jalapeño pepper, seeds removed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: Cut the mango into 1/4-inch dice and place in a bowl. Add the remaining ingredients and fold together with a rubber spatula. Refrigerate, covered, for up to 3 hours before serving.
